name: ready

ready adjective
(PREPARED)
Add to word list

A1 prepared and suitable for fast activity: [ + to infinitive ] Are you ready to leave?ready to Are you ready to order, Madam?ready when you are Okay, Evie, ready when you are (= I am ready to do what we have arranged). Dinner's ready! Are you ready? Hurry up - we're late.get ready We're leaving at eight o'clock, so you've got half an hour to get ready.ready for The army are said to be ready for action.be made/got ready for something The concert hall was made/got ready (= prepared) for the performance. ready and waiting
waiting and prepared to act: Secret information allowed the police to be ready and waiting when the robbers came out of the bank.
